title: Tamil Nadu film body poll: Rival camp ousts Sarath Kumar
text: Family, fans mourn death of legendary regional actress Manorama 01:27 Chennai, Oct 12 (ANI): Family members, friends and fans of legendary regional actress Gopishantha - better-known by her stage name Manorama - gathered in Tamil Nadu to pay tribute to the actress who died after suffering a heart attack. Manorama, 78, passed away at a hospital in Chennai city on... You Might Like
